content:
Momo was very open and relaxed about her sexuality, which was refreshing to Val. Val had always felt restricted by societal norms and expectations, and she admired Momo's carefree attitude towards sex and relationships.

After their initial hookup, Val and Momo spent the night talking, getting to know each other, and sharing stories. Val was surprised at how easy it was to talk to Momo, and how comfortable she felt in her presence. Momo had a way of putting people at ease, and Val found herself opening up in ways she never had before.

As they lay in bed together, Val couldn't help but feel drawn to Momo's easy-going nature and carefree attitude. She found herself wanting to spend more time with her, and the thought of leaving in the morning filled her with a sense of sadness.

The next day, they exchanged contact information and promised to stay in touch. Val wasn't sure where things would go with Momo, but she knew that she wanted to explore the connection they had formed, and see where it might lead.
